lead_paragraph: The chorus calling for a change in the team’s name broadened last month when 10 members of Congress condemned the franchise for using a “racial, derogatory slur” as its mascot.
snippet: The chorus calling for a change in the team’s name broadened last month when 10 members of Congress condemned the franchise for using a “racial, derogatory slur” as its mascot.
